imdb.plot outline: Dr. Paula speaks with regular people and helps them make changes that lead them to a more balanced life. Dr. Bromberg said she'll be speaking with patients having, "A conversation to explore the many possibilities available to us to live a healthy, happy, wholesome life."
imdb.title: Conversations with Dr. Paula
plot: Patients with psychological issues make decisions to improve their health.::Anonymous

Dr. Paula speaks with regular people and helps them make changes that lead them to a more balanced life. Dr. Bromberg said she'll be speaking with patients having, "A conversation to explore the many possibilities available to us to live a healthy, happy, wholesome life."::Anonymous
